title: [K-12] GelMA Hydrogel Physical Property Optimization Basics Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of life sciences and general understanding of polymer materials
context.additional_context: A foundational course for pre-service teachers to understand core concepts in biomaterials and apply them in educational settings.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the correlation between molecular network density of GelMA hydrogels and their application fields
Learners can graphically analyze the effects of substitution degree (DS) and concentration on hydrogel properties
Learners can propose optimized GelMA hydrogel design strategies for tissue regeneration and drug delivery systems

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
